recipe.title: Green Bean Salad
recipe.ingredient: (use dried if you dont have fresh available)
recipe.step: Cook washed and trimmed beans in water in the microwave for 5 minutes. Rinse immediately and place in freezer. While beans are cooling off, cut cherry tomatoes in half or quarters. Place all ingredients for dressing in a glass jar and shake well. Remove beans from freezer and mix in basil and tomatoes. Pour over dressing and lastly sprinkle over pine nuts (if using.) serve immediately as a side.
